There is no mention of any plan of redemption for the angels. Based on those verses pertaining to fallen angels, they continue to work against God. 1 Peter 5:8, “Be of sober spirit, be on the alert. Consider Revelation 20:10. There is no hint of redemption for fallen angels (any) in the Torah or in the NT. Therefore consider what a great and marvelous redeeming work Christ has accomplished for his sheep.
